text: Three for the Show is a 1955 American musical movie directed by H. C. Potter and based on the 1919 play Home and Beauty by W. Somerset Maugham. It stars Betty Grable, Jack Lemmon, Gower Champion, Marge Champion, Myron McCormick and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1955 musical movies Category:American musical movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by H. C. Potter
title: Three for the Show
